game.name: Our Adventurer Guild
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 모험가 길드의 신임 길드장이 되어 탐험과 턴제 전투에서 모험가들을 이끄세요. 과연 당신의 지도 하에 길드는 번영하게 될까요? 아니면 결국 해산하고 말까요?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Become the new Guild Master of the Adventurer Guild and lead your adventurers in explorations and turnbased tactical battles. Will the Guild thrive under your leadership? Or will it finally disband under it?

reviewHighlights.text: Despite looking like a game from Newgrounds, this is probably one of the closest games in feel to Final Fantasy Tactics mixed with an adventuring guil...
Genuinely one of the biggest surprises I've had in gaming in as long as I can remember. Somehow a single guy made one of the best SRPGs in years. This...
